title: Unbelievable brownstone triplex penthouse with balcony, views!
posting_body: ['MUST SEE.', 'SHOWING WEDS AUG 3RD AT 2:15PM VIRTUALLY OR IN PERSON, BY APPT.', 'ONE MONTH BROKER FEE.', 'Baller apartment alert!', 'This is real Manhattan living in comfort and style in the heart of it all.', 'Five minute walk to Central Park, close to all major museums, easy <5 min walking distance to almost every subway line, and only 15 minutes to Washington Square Park.', 'HUGE triplex penthouse with massive living room with balcony, 4 even sized bedrooms, 3 baths, decorative fireplace and a gorgeous kitchen too.', 'Right off 5th Avenue in a classic NYC brownstone.', 'This apartment has it all, is priced to MOVE and will go fast.', 'Call Pam at Vanderborgh Realty ASAP to schedule a viewing!', 'Pam: 516.262.3693', 'Minimum one year lease.', 'Pet friendly.', 'Small, friendly landlord requires 1 month rent and 1 month security deposit at lease signing and US guarantors are accepted as needed.', 'I ALSO HAVE:', '-A 2BR / 3BA + HOME OFFICE PENTHOUSE WITH ENORMOUS PRIVATE TERRACE FOR $13250 ON UES', '-ANOTHER 2BR / 3BA + HOME OFFICE THERE', 'ALSO WITH HUGE PRIVAGE OUTDOOR SPACEFOR $11500', '-A 5000 SQ FT DUPLEX 3BR / 3BA  PENTHOUSE WITH TWO ENORMOUS TERRACES ON LOWER PARK AVE $27000 FULL SVC LUXE', '-A LOFT', 'STYLE ONE BEDROOM PENTHOUSE IN CENTRAL WEST VILLAGE $7700', 'We are a long-time local realtor specializing in the areas we know and love best, happy to assist our clients through these challenging times.', 'The landlord requires that we ask prospective tenants a few questions before showing the unit, text 516.262.3693 for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Nick and Pam', '516.262.3693', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, AND 4 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST VILLAGE, WEST VILLAGE, SOHO, CHELSEA, LES, UNION SQUARE, GRAMERCY, KIPS BAY, AND HELLS KITCHEN AREAS.', 'CALL US TODAY AND WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST IN YOUR SEARCH.', 'ALSO CHECK OUT NICK’S BLOG FOR THE BEST OF EATING AND DRINKING IN THE EAST VILLAGE:', '<URL>/ for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Nick and Pam', '516.262.3693', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, AND 4 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST VILLAGE, WEST VILLAGE, SOHO, CHELSEA, LES, UNION SQUARE, GRAMERCY, KIPS BAY, AND HELLS KITCHEN AREAS.', 'CALL
